Name: Nager.Date
Description: Public holidays for more than 90 countries

Function_Description.CountryCountryInfo:
Get country info for the given country
Parameters: {"countryCode": "Required. string. Two-character represented country code. For instance, CN or cn represents China."}
Function_Description.LongWeekendLongWeekend:
Get long weekends for a given country
Parameters: {"year": "Required. integer. ", "countryCode": "Required. string. Two-character represented country code. For instance, CN or cn represents China."}
Function_Description.PublicHolidayPublicHolidaysV3:
Get public holidays
Parameters: {"year": "Required. integer. ", "countryCode": "Required. string. Two-character represented country code. For instance, CN or cn represents China."}
Function_Description.PublicHolidayIsTodayPublicHoliday:
Is today a public holiday
Parameters: {"countryCode": "Required. string. Two-character represented country code. For instance, CN or cn represents China."}
Function_Description.PublicHolidayNextPublicHolidays:
Returns the upcoming public holidays for the next 365 days for the given country
Parameters: {"countryCode": "Required. string. Two-character represented country code. For instance, CN or cn represents China."}
Function_Description.PublicHolidayNextPublicHolidaysWorldwide:
Returns the upcoming public holidays for the next 7 days
Parameters: {}
Function_Description.VersionGetVersion:
Get version of the used Nager.Date library
Parameters: {}

Instances.Instruction: Can you check if today is a public holiday in China?
Get the country info for China.
Get the list of all available countries for public holiday information.
I want to know the version of the Nager.Date library being used. Can you fetch that for me?
I need to find out if there are any long weekends in the United States in 2024. Can you help me with that?
Find out the next public holidays for the Great Britain.
I'm curious about the public holidays in Australia in 2023. Can you fetch the list for me?
Get the upcoming public holidays worldwide for the next 7 days.
I'm planning a trip to Japan next year. Can you find out if there are any long weekends in Japan in 2023? It would be great to align my trip with a long weekend.
I'm curious about the public holidays in different countries. Could you show me the public holidays for the next week worldwide?
I'm working on a project about different countries. Can you provide me with information about France, such as its official name, region, and neighboring countries?
I'm interested in knowing the upcoming public holidays in Germany. Could you fetch that information for me?
I'm creating a calendar for my international team. Can you help me find the public holidays in the USA for 2023?
I'm planning a road trip across Europe. Can you provide me with information about Italy, including its common name, official name, and the countries it shares borders with?
Can you help me plan my next vacation by checking the public holidays in Japan and Germany for the next year? I want to make sure I don't miss any important dates.
Hey, I'm curious about the holidays in different countries. Can you compare the number of public holidays in Canada, and Mexico for 2023?
I'm planning a surprise visit to my friend in Germany. I need to know when the next long weekend of the year 2023 is coming up, so I can plan my trip.

Name: AviationAPI
Description: FAA Aeronautical Charts and Publications, Airport Information, and Airport Weather

Function_Description.airports_get:
Get an airport by its ICAO or FAA identifier
Parameters: {"apt": "Required. string. FAA or ICAO facility identifier (KAVL or AVL). Separate multiple entries with a comma."}
Function_Description.charts_get:
Get charts for a specified airport
Parameters: {"apt": "Required. string. FAA or ICAO airport identifier (KAVL or AVL). Separate multiple entries with a comma.", "group": "integer. Optional grouping of the charts. 1 -> General, Departures, Arrivals, Approaches; 2 -> Airport Diagram only; 3 -> General only; 4 -> Departures only; 5 -> Arrivals only; 6 -> Approaches only; 7 -> Everything but General."}
Function_Description.charts_changes_get:
Get chart changes by airport or chart name
Parameters: {"apt": "Required. string. FAA or ICAO airport identifier (KAVL or AVL).", "chart_name": "string. Partial or full name of the chart/procedure."}
Function_Description.charts_afd_get:
Get the AFD for a specified airport
Parameters: {"apt": "Required. string. FAA or ICAO airport identifier (KCLT or CLT)."}
Function_Description.preferred-routes_get:
Get all of the preferred routes
Parameters: {}

Instances.Instruction: I'm planning a trip to Asheville, North Carolina and I'd like to know more about the Asheville Regional Airport. Can you find the details for me using its FAA identifier, AVL?

I'm preparing for a flight to Asheville Regional Airport (ICAO: AVL). Can you get me the aeronautical charts for this airport? I would like to see the general, departures, arrivals, and approaches charts specifically.
I've heard that there have been some changes to the charts for Asheville Regional Airport (ICAO: AVL). Can you check if there are any updates to the 'Arrivals' chart?
I'm a bit nervous about my upcoming flight. Can you find the Airport Facility Directory (AFD) for Asheville Regional Airport (ICAO: AVL) to help me familiarize myself with the airport layout?
I'm curious about the preferred routes for flights. Can you find all of the preferred routes for me?

I'm studying for my pilot's license and need some help. Could you fetch me the aeronautical chart for Los Angeles International Airport (ICAO: KLAX)? Also, please provide me with the airport's elevation and the type of fuel available there.

I'm a travel blogger and I'm writing about the airports in New York. Can you provide me with the airport information for John F. Kennedy International Airport (ICAO: KJFK) and LaGuardia Airport (ICAO: KLGA)?

Name: chucknorris.io

Function_Description.jokes_random_get:
Retrieve a random Chuck Norris joke
Parameters: {}
Function_Description.jokes_random_category_get:

Function_Description.jokes_search_get:

Name: Cataas
Description: Cat as a service (cats pictures and gifs)

Function_Description.getRandomCat:
Get random cat

Function_Description.findCatByTag:

Function_Description.findCatWithText:
Get random cat saying text
Parameters: {"text": "Required. string. Text that the cat says.", "type": "string. Filter by cat type.", "width": "string. Desired width of the cat image.", "height": "string. Desired height of the cat image."}

Instances.Instruction: Hey, can you help me find a random cat picture? I need one with a width of 500 pixels and a height of 300 pixels.
I'm looking for a cat picture with the tag 'cute'. Could you find me a random one? Make sure it has a width of 800 pixels and a height of 600 pixels.

I'm planning a surprise party for my friend who loves cats. Could you help me design an invitation? I'd like a picture of a cat with a party hat, and the text "You're invited to a purr-fect party!" on it.

Name: Httpbin
Description: A Simple HTTP Request & Response Service

Function_Description.sendHttpRequest:
Send an HTTP request with the specified method, headers, and data to the Httpbin API for testing purposes.
Parameters: {"method": "Required. string. One of: [GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, PATCH]. The HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, or PATCH).", "url": "Required. string. The endpoint URL to send the request to.", "headers": "Object.  A key-value pair of headers to include in the request.", "data": "Object.  A key-value pair of data to include in the request body."}
Function_Description.getClientRequestData:
Retrieve the client's request data, including headers, form data, uploaded files, and cookies.
Parameters: {"url": "Required. string. The endpoint URL to send the request to."}
Function_Description.simulateStatusCode:
Send a request to the Httpbin API's status code simulation endpoint to test how your application handles specific status codes.
Parameters: {"url": "Required. string. The endpoint URL to send the request to.", "statusCode": "Required. integer. The HTTP status code to simulate."}

Instances.Instruction: I'm troubleshooting some requests, so can you help me send a POST request to https://httpbin.org/post with the header "Content-Type: application/json" and the data '{"name": "John Doe", "email": "john.doe@example.com"}'? Let me know the response details.
Could you send a GET request to the following URL to retrieve my request information: 'https://httpbin.org/get' ? I'd like to see the details of my headers, cookies, and other request data.

I have a feeling that some proxy headers aren't being passed correctly. Can you send a request to https://httpbin.org/headers with the headers "X-Forwarded-For: 192.168.1.1" and "X-Real-IP: 10.0.0.1"? I'd like to verify if the headers are properly forwarded by the proxy.
I'd like to see how my application responds to a 404 status code. Please send a request to https://httpbin.org/status/404 and let me know the details of the received status code and response headers.
I need to test how my app handles a "PATCH" request. Can you send a PATCH request to https://httpbin.org/patch with the data '{"field": "value"}' and tell me the response?
I'd like to see how my app deals with a 503 Service Unavailable error. Send a request to https://httpbin.org/status/503 so that I can observe my application's behavior.
Would you mind sending a DELETE request to https://httpbin.org/delete and telling me the response status code and headers? I'm checking if my app processes this method appropriately.

I need to test my app's behavior when receiving cookies. Can you send a GET request to https://httpbin.org/cookies/set?sessionid=1234567890abcde and then retrieve the cookie data by sending another GET request to https://httpbin.org/cookies?
I want to see if my app can properly handle a "HEAD" request. Can you send a HEAD request to https://httpbin.org/head and give me the details of the response headers?

Name: Weatherbit
Description: Get weather information

Function_Description.getCurrentWeather:
Retrieve the current weather data for a specific location.
Parameters: {"latitude": "Required. number. Latitude of the location.", "longitude": "Required. number. Longitude of the location."}
Function_Description.getHourlyForecast:
Retrieve an hourly weather forecast for a specific location.
Parameters: {"latitude": "Required. number. Latitude of the location.", "longitude": "Required. number. Longitude of the location.", "hours": "integer. Number of hours to retrieve the forecast for."}
Function_Description.getDailyForecast:
Retrieve a daily weather forecast for a specific location.
Parameters: {"latitude": "Required. number. Latitude of the location.", "longitude": "Required. number. Longitude of the location.", "days": "integer. Number of days to retrieve the forecast for."}
Function_Description.getHistoricalWeather:
Retrieve historical weather data for a specific location and date range.
Parameters: {"latitude": "Required. number. Latitude of the location.", "longitude": "Required. number. Longitude of the location.", "startDate": "Required. string. Start date of the historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format.", "endDate": "Required. string. End date of the historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format."}
Function_Description.getAirQuality:
Retrieve air quality data for a specific location.
Parameters: {"latitude": "Required. number. Latitude of the location.", "longitude": "Required. number. Longitude of the location."}
Function_Description.getSatelliteImages:
Retrieve satellite images for a specific location and date.
Parameters: {"latitude": "Required. number. Latitude of the location.", "longitude": "Required. number. Longitude of the location.", "date": "Required. string. Date of the satellite image in YYYY-MM-DD format."}
Function_Description.getRadarData:
Retrieve radar data for a specific location and date.
Parameters: {"latitude": "Required. number. Latitude of the location.", "longitude": "Required. number. Longitude of the location.", "date": "Required. string. Date of the radar data in YYYY-MM-DD format."}

Instances.Instruction: I'm planning a picnic tomorrow at Central Park, New York, with the coordinates 40.785091, -73.968285. Inform me about the daily weather forecast for tomorrow.

For my morning exercise routine, it's important to know the air quality around my neighborhood. My address is 34.052235, -118.243683 in Los Angeles. Can you provide me with the air quality data for my location?

I want to compare the weather from this week(2019-12-30 to 2020-01-05) to the same week last year(2019-01-01 to 2019-01-07) in Paris, France, located at 48.8566, 2.3522. Please give me the historical weather data for these date ranges. Today is January 1, 2020.
I'm planning to go for a hike this afternoon around Lake Tahoe, with the coordinates 39.0968, -120.0324. How's the weather looking there now? Retrieve the current weather data for me, please.
I'm interested in viewing a satellite image of my hometown, Sydney, Australia, located at -33.8688, 151.2093 on my birthday, which was 2020-11-25, last year. Can you fetch that image for me?

I'll be studying at the library for the next six hours, and I want to know if it will rain during that time. My location is 41.823987, -71.412834 in Providence, Rhode Island. Please provide an hourly weather forecast for the next six hours with any relevant information about precipitation.

My family and I are going on a road trip tomorrow, and we will be at 36.1627, -86.7816 in Nashville, Tennessee for the next three days. Provide me with a detailed daily weather forecast for these upcoming days.
I've heard there was a thunderstorm last night in Miami, Florida, with coordinates 25.7617, -80.1918. Can you show me its radar data on August 20, 2020?
For my workout outdoors today, I need to know if it's windy in Barcelona, Spain, at 41.3851, 2.1734. Obtain current weather data for Barcelona and provide me with wind speed and direction.
I wonder how the air quality is around Tokyo, Japan, with coordinates 35.6895, 139.6917. Obtain the air quality data for Tokyo and help me understand if it's safe to go out for a jog today.

Function_Description.searchQuotes:

Function_Description.getQuoteById:

Function_Description.getTags:
Retrieve a list of all available tags in the Tronald Dump database.
Parameters: {}
Function_Description.getQuotesByTag:
Retrieve quotes or tweets based on a specific tag.
Parameters: {"tag": "Required. string. The tag to filter quotes and tweets by."}

Instances.Instruction: I can't remember the exact words, but there was this ridiculous quote about Trump wanting to build a wall. Could you find a quote or tweet from him containing the words "build" and "wall"?
I'm having a debate with someone and need a laugh. Fetch me a random quote from Donald Trump to lighten the mood.
A few years ago, I remember Trump tweeting something bizarre about covfefe. Can you find the exact tweet for me, along with its date and source?
Hey, can you provide me a list of all the tags available in the Tronald Dump database? I'd love to see what topics are covered.
I'm writing an article about climate change and recalled that Trump had some amusing quotes on this topic. Could you retrieve some quotes where he talks about "climate change"?
Remember that funny quote you found yesterday? Can you look it up again? I think the ID was "pgm-5f5jDDrrzm0gSoe7ow". Show me the quote, date, and source.

Name: StackExchange
Description: Q&A forum for developers

Function_Description.searchQuestions:
Search for questions on StackExchange based on a set of criteria.
Parameters: {"q": "string. Optional. String. The search query.", "tagged": "string. Optional. String. A list of tags separated by semicolons."}
Function_Description.getQuestionById:
Retrieve a specific question by its ID.
Parameters: {"question_id": "Required. integer. Required. Integer. The ID of the question to retrieve."}
Function_Description.getUserById:
Retrieve a specific user by their ID.
Parameters: {"user_id": "Required. integer. Required. Integer. The ID of the user to retrieve."}
Function_Description.getAnswersByQuestionId:
Retrieve all answers for a specific question by its ID.
Parameters: {"question_id": "Required. integer. Required. Integer. The ID of the question to retrieve answers for.", "sort": "string. One of: [votes, creation, activity]. Optional. String. The sort order of the results (votes, creation, activity)."}
Function_Description.getTags:
Retrieve a list of tags on StackExchange.
Parameters: {"sort": "string. One of: [popular, activity, name]. Optional. String. The sort order of the results (popular, activity, name)."}

Instances.Instruction: I'm working on a Python project and just encountered a weird error message. Can you help me find some questions on StackExchange about this error? Look for questions tagged with 'python' and containing the phrase "AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute".

One of my team members mentioned a popular question on StackExchange about JavaScript promises. The question ID is 14220321. Can you get the details of that question for me, as I would like to read it later?

I came across a really helpful answer by a user named 'Jon Skeet' on StackExchange. Can you please find this user's profile by their display name, and let me know their reputation? The user ID is 1300921.

I'd like to know more about popular topics among developers right now. Can you show me the top 10 most popular tags on StackExchange, sorted by the number of questions?

I stumbled upon a question with ID 33437643, discussing Android's RecyclerView performance optimizations. Can you find the question and also fetch its answers, sorted by the most recent answers first?

I'd like to explore some questions related to the concept of "dependency injection" in C#. Can you search for questions containing "dependency injection" that are tagged with 'C#', and sort the results by votes?

I found an interesting user with ID 22656, who shares insightful answers on software engineering topics. Can you get this user's details, particularly their display name, reputation, and profile image?
I want to familiarize myself with Angular topics on StackExchange. Can you find questions tagged with 'angular'?

Name: Aemet
Description: Weather and forecast data from Spain

Function_Description.getCurrentWeather:
Retrieves the current weather data for a specified location in Spain.
Parameters: {"location": "Required. string. The name of the location in Spain for which the current weather data is requested."}
Function_Description.getHistoricalWeather:
Retrieves historical weather data for a specified location in Spain and time period.
Parameters: {"location": "Required. string. The name of the location in Spain for which the historical weather data is requested.", "startDate": "Required. string. The start date of the time period for which historical weather data is requested (format: YYYY-MM-DD).", "endDate": "Required. string. The end date of the time period for which historical weather data is requested (format: YYYY-MM-DD)."}
Function_Description.getWeatherForecast:
Retrieves weather forecast data for a specified location in Spain for up to one week in advance.
Parameters: {"location": "Required. string. The name of the location in Spain for which the weather forecast data is requested.", "days": "integer. The number of days in advance for which the weather forecast data is requested (e.g. 7 days)."}
Function_Description.searchLocation:
Searches for a location in Spain based on a query string.
Parameters: {"query": "Required. string. The query string to search for a location in Spain."}
Function_Description.listLocations:
Retrieves a list of all available locations in Spain for which weather data is available.
Parameters: {}

Instances.Instruction: I'm trying to find the weather in Barcelona right now. Can you please tell me the current temperature, precipitation levels, humidity, and wind speed in that city?

I'm planning a trip to Spain but haven't decided which city to visit yet. Can you provide me with a list of available locations with weather data to help me during my decision-making process?

I'm doing a project on climate change and its impact on cities in Spain. I need the historical weather data for Bilbao from January 1st, 2020 to December 31st, 2020. Please provide the information, including temperature, precipitation, humidity, and wind speed.

I've heard there's a city called Cadiz in Spain but can't find it on the map. Can you search for this location and give me its location? I'd also like to know the weather forecast for the next three days, including temperature, precipitation, humidity, and wind speed.

Name: MetaWeather
Description: Get weather information

Function_Description.searchLocation:
Search for a location by its name or coordinates to retrieve its WOEID.

Function_Description.getLocationWeather:
Retrieve current weather information for a specific location using its WOEID.

Function_Description.getHistoricalWeather:
Fetch historical weather data for a specific location using its WOEID for the past 30 days.

Function_Description.getWeatherForecast:
Explore weather forecasts for a specific location using its WOEID up to five days ahead.
Parameters: {"woeid": "Required. integer. The WOEID of the location."}
Function_Description.getDetailedWeatherInfo:
Get detailed information about the weather conditions for a specific location using its WOEID, including sunrise and sunset times, air pressure, weather forecasts, and more.
Parameters: {"woeid": "Required. integer. The WOEID of the location."}

My friend lives in Sydney, and I'm curious about the weather there. Could you search for Sydney's WOEID (The answer is 1105779) and fetch the current weather details?

Can you tell me what the weather was like in Los Angeles on January 10th, 2022? First, find the WOEID for Los Angeles (The answer is 2442047) and then use that to check the historical weather data.
I have a meeting in Chicago next week, and I need to know the weather conditions. Search for Chicago's WOEID (The answer is 2379574) and give me the detailed weather information.

I'd like to know how the weather will be in Berlin over the next few days. Get Berlin's WOEID (The answer is 638242) and show me the weather forecasts for the next five days so I can plan accordingly.

Name: Lingua Robot
Description: Word definitions, pronunciations, synonyms, antonyms and others

Function_Description.getWordDefinition:
Retrieve the definition of a word, including example usage.
Parameters: {"word": "Required. string. Required. The word to get the definition for.", "language": "string. One of: [en, es, fr]. Required. The language of the word."}

The date for which video data is requested in YYYY-MM-DD format.", "type": "Required. string. One of: [weather, astronomy]. The type of video data requested, such as 'weather' or 'astronomy'."}

Name: openrouteservice.org
Description: Directions, POIs, isochrones, geocoding (+reverse), elevation, and more

Function_Description.getDirections:
Retrieve directions between two or more locations
Parameters: {"start": "Required. string. Starting location as latitude,longitude.", "end": "Required. string. Ending location as latitude,longitude.", "traffic": "boolean. Include real-time traffic information."}
Function_Description.searchPOIs:
Search for points of interest (POIs) within a specified area or along a route
Parameters: {"query": "Required. string. Search query for the POI.", "location": "string. Location as latitude,longitude.", "radius": "integer. Search radius in meters."}
Function_Description.getIsochrones:
Calculate isochrones (areas that can be reached within a certain time/distance) for a given location
Parameters: {"location": "Required. string. Location as latitude,longitude.", "time": "Optional, integer. Time in minutes.", "distance": "Optional, integer. Distance in meters."}
Function_Description.geocodeAddress:
Convert an address to geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude)
Parameters: {"address": "Required. string. The address to be geocoded."}
Function_Description.reverseGeocodeCoordinates:
Retrieve meaningful location information (such as address) from latitude and longitude coordinates
Parameters: {"coordinates": "Required. string. Latitude and longitude coordinates."}
Function_Description.getElevationData:
Retrieve elevation data for a given location or along a route
Parameters: {"location": "string. Location as latitude,longitude.", "route": "Array[string].  Route as an array of latitude,longitude coordinates."}
