Name: Codex
Description: Online Compiler for Various Languages

Function_Description.compileCode:
Compiles the given code in the specified language and returns the compiled code.
Parameters: {"code": "string. The code to be compiled.", "language": "string. The language in which the code is written. One of: [C, C++, Java, Python]."}
Function_Description.debugCode:
Debugs the given code in the specified language and returns any errors or warnings.
Parameters: {"code": "string. The code to be debugged.", "language": "string. The language in which the code is written. One of: [C, C++, Java, Python]."}
Function_Description.runCode:
Runs the given code in the specified language and returns the output.
Parameters: {"code": "string. The code to be run.", "language": "string. The language in which the code is written. One of: [C, C++, Java, Python]."}
Function_Description.shareCode:
Shares the given code snippet with others.
Parameters: {"code": "string. The code to be shared.", "language": "string. The language in which the code is written. One of: [C, C++, Java, Python]."}
Function_Description.searchCode:
Searches for code snippets based on the specified search criteria.
Parameters: {"query": "Required. string. The search query.", "language": "string. One of: [C, C++, Java, Python]. The language in which the code is written.", "author": "string. The author of the code snippet.", "date": "string. The date the code snippet was created."}
Function_Description.listLanguages:
Lists all the programming languages supported by Codex.
Parameters: {}
Function_Description.listAuthors:
Lists all the authors who have shared code snippets on Codex.
Parameters: {}

Name: Yelp
Description: Find Local Business

Function_Description.searchBusinesses:
Search for businesses based on location, term, category, and more.
Parameters: {"term": "string. Search term (e.g. 'food', 'restaurants'). If term isn't included we search everything.", "location": "Required. string. The location of the business to search for. Can be specified as a city, state code, zip code, or country.", "categories": "string. Categories to filter the search results with. Separate multiple categories with a comma.", "price": "string. Price level to filter the search results with. Separate multiple price levels with a comma.", "open_now": "boolean. Whether to only return businesses that are open now.", "sort_by": "string. One of: [best_match, rating, review_count, distance]. Sort the results by one of the available options (best_match, rating, review_count, distance).", "limit": "integer. Number of business results to return. Maximum is 50.", "offset": "integer. Offset the list of returned business results by this amount.", "radius": "integer. Radius (in meters) around the specified location to search within. Maximum is 40,000 meters (25 miles)."}
Function_Description.getBusinessDetails:
Fetch details of a specific business, including rating, reviews, photos, and hours of operation.
Parameters: {"id": "Required. string. The Yelp ID of the business to retrieve details for."}

Function_Description.getVersions:
Retrieve metadata for specific Bible versions.
Parameters: {"language": "string. The language of the Bible version.", "publisher": "string. The publisher of the Bible version."}

Instances.Instruction: Can you help me find a specific verse in the Bible? I need the text from John chapter 3 verse 16.
Hey, can you search the Bible for the phrase "love your neighbor", in King James Version? Please include the book, chapter, and verse where it's found.
I want to find all the available Bible versions in Spanish. Can you help me with that?
I'm looking for a specific Bible version published by Zondervan. Can you give me the details of all available versions?
Can you get me the text of Genesis chapter 1 verse 1? I need it for a project.
Hey, can you search the Bible for the keyword "grace"? Please include the book, chapter, and verse where it's found.
I need to find all the available Bible versions in French. Can you help me with that?
Can you give me the details of all the Bible versions published by Thomas Nelson?
I want to find a Bible version in Portuguese. Can you give me the details of all available versions?
Hey, can you search the Bible for the phrase "do not fear"? Please include the book, chapter, and verse where it's found.
